domain.name: Political Body
domain.description: A section of a government, like The Supreme Court

entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text:
@WhiteHouse @WhiteHouse REALLY! Yesterday @ 5pmmy first friend ever Joey Irizarry succumbed to CORONAVIRUS. 49 yo.
@ 3am my wife's godmother passed. 82 yo
@ 4:40am my 44 yo cousin passed.
Not to mention 4 others in the last 3 weeks. 2 choices, cremation or mass burial! So yea WINNING!
